multimonster.resourcemanager
Interface ResourceManagerFacade

All Known Implementing Classes:
ResourceManagerImplBean
public interface ResourceManagerFacade

The ResourceManager manages the resources of the system. The ResourceManager does not prohibit using resources without requesting. So you don't have to request resources a the ResourceManager but you should. The ResourceManager is only able to keep the quality of service if every resource consuming action requests the resources befor starting.

Author:
Holger Velke (sihovelk)

Method Detail

requestResources

public ResourceRequestIdentifier requestResources(UserIdentifier uId,
                                                  Costs costs,
                                                  QueueTime maxQT,
                                                  ResourceWaiter waiter)
                                           throws ResourceManagerException
Requests resources. The request stays pending until the maxQT expires. If the requested are available the waiter is notified.

Parameters:
uId - The Id of the user who requests the resources
costs - The expected resource-costs
maxQT - The maximal time to wait.
waiter - The requestand waiting for resources
Returns:
a ResourceRequestIdentifier
Throws:
ResourceManagerException

requestResources

public ResourceRequestIdentifier requestResources(UserIdentifier uId,
                                                  Costs costs)
                                           throws ResourceManagerException
Requests resources that have to be immediately available. The ResourceRequestIdentifier returned is needed to release the requested an reserved resources.

Parameters:
uId - The Id of the user who requests the resources
costs - The expected resource-costs
Returns:
If requested resources are granted a ResourceRequestIdentifier is returend.

If not null is returned.

Throws:
ResourceManagerException

releaseResources

public Costs releaseResources(ResourceRequestIdentifier rrId)
                       throws ResourceManagerException
Releases the resources specified by the ResourceRequestIdentifier and returns the real costs of the request.

Parameters:
rrId - The id of the resources to release
Returns:
the real costs of the request
Throws:
ResourceManagerException
